issue.title: presearch.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://presearch.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fpresearch.com%2F) ### Comment > bottom right corner should be blocked Username: `@muhasturk` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/pn2a9qghy2ow44c444oscc8c0c0oc8wba33e3330r4.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.19.0 (4853) System version: | Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.22631.0 Browser: | Firefox License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection options: | Block WebRTC,
Block Java,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Hide your Referrer from third-parties (presearch.com),
Hide your User-Agent,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,

Bypass Paywalls Clean filter (url: https://gitflic.ru/project/magnolia1234/bypass-paywalls-clean-filters/blob/raw?file=bpc-paywall-filter.txt) Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | AdsBypasser (url: https://adsbypasser.github.io/releases/adsbypasser.full.es7.user.js)

[https://www.reddit.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.reddit.com%2F) ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?adblocking.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&custom_filters=User%2520filter%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29%2CHide%2520YouTube%2520Shorts%2520%28url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fraw.githubusercontent.com%2Fgijsdev%2Fublock-hide-yt-shorts%2Fmaster%2Flist.txt%29%2CBypass%2520Paywalls%2520Clean%2520filter%2520%28url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fgitflic.ru%2Fproject%2Fmagnolia1234%2Fbypass-paywalls-clean-filters%2Fblob%2Fraw%3Ffile%3Dbpc-paywall-filter.txt%29&dns.custom_bootstrap=&dns.custom_fallback=&dns.custom_filters=User%2520DNS%2520filter%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29%2Coisd%2520big%2520%28url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fbig.oisd.nl%2F%29&dns.enabled=true&dns.fallback_mode=System&dns.filters=15&dns.servers=https%3A%2F%2Fd.adguard-dns.com%2Fdns-query%2Fxxxxxxx&dns.timeout=0&extensions=AdsBypasser%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fadsbypasser.github.io%2Freleases%2Fadsbypasser.full.es7.user.js%29%2CAdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fadguard-extra%2F1.0%2Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%2CAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fpopup-blocker%2F2.5%2Fpopupblocker.user.js%29%2CBypass%2520All%2520Shortlinks%2520Debloated%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fcodeberg.org%2FAmm0ni4%2Fbypass-all-shortlinks-debloated%2Fraw%2Fbranch%2Fmain%2FBypass_All_Shortlinks.user.js%29%2CBypass%2520Paywalls%2520Clean%2520-%2520en%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fgitflic.ru%2Fproject%2Fmagnolia1234%2Fbypass-paywalls-clean-filters%2Fblob%2Fraw%3Ffile%3Duserscript%2Fbpc.en.user.js%29&extensions.enabled=true&filters=208.249.11.13.14.17.18.19.1.20.21.224.2.3.4.6.9&license_type=paid&product_type=Win&product_version=7.19.0+%284853%29&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.reddit.com%2F&scheme_version=2&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_t issue.title: jp.reuters.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://jp.reuters.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fjp.reuters.com%2F) ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/lnm5n84y4y88k0sksoswks0w04c44g88h3lsyjdrnc.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/1mtkcp08qb7ogw4wokkkoo0s0cw0s4gc69r82v1uq0.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.16.3.1867 release System version: | MacOS 15.2 (Build 24C101) Browser: | Safari Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `System`
filters: `AdGuard DNS filter` Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base
